channel.title: Simple, but need help
channel.description:
ok i want to knwo were the object handlers is. Ex. like in shops ect u can move there location and ect. were can i move the objects location?
also were can i go to delte the runes spells. i want to make it so i can cast veng with no runes. were do i go?
server: 317

item.title: Simple, but need help
item.dc:creator: @mrjad mrjad
item.description:
@mrjad wrote:

ok, your englis ain’t dat gewd, so ill try to understand what you said,

TO MOVE A SHOP I THINK YOUR TALKING ABOUT MOVING A NPC(NON PLAYER CHARACTER)
FIRST YOU NEED TO FIND THE NPC’S ID, THEN YOU MUST OPEN UP AUTOSPAWN.CFG, CTRL-F AND FIND THAT NPC’S SPAWN THINGY, THEN JUST CHANGE THE COORDINATES.

as for your other one, haven’t got a clue

Read full topic
